content: धातृ {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [धा-तृच्] {@--1@} A maker, creator, originator, author. {@--2@} A bearer, preserver, supporter. {@--3@} An epithet of Brahmā, the creator of the world; मन्ये दुर्जनचित्तवृत्तिहरणे धातापि भग्नोद्यमः <ls>H. 2. 165</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 6</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 13</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 44</ls>; <ls>Ki. 12. 33.</ls> {@--4@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--5@} The soul. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> for the seven sages (सप्तर्षि) being the first creation of Brahmā; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ku. 6. 9.</ls> {@--7@} A married woman's paramour, adulterer. {@--8@} One of the forty-nine winds. {@--9@} An arranger. {@--10@} One who nourishes.
